rooms.description: Open space with reception and waiting area, aligned towards the east according to Vastu for welcoming positive energy.
Spacious living room adjoining the central courtyard. Natural lighting from windows on the southern wall.
Adjacent to the living room, with direct access to the courtyard for an open feel.
Fully functional kitchen placed in the south-eastern corner to follow Vastu principles and ensure positive energy flow.
Master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the courtyard, north-west oriented for privacy.
Additional bedroom with a spacious balcony providing natural light and ventilation.
Multipurpose room for family gatherings, positioned centrally to connect with the courtyard.
Shared bathroom facilities located near bedrooms and kitchen for ease of access.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the north to adhere to Vastu principles, facilitating a smooth flow of energy into the home.
Large windows in living areas and bedrooms for ample natural light; east-facing windows recommended for positive energy while south-facing windows ensure ventilation.

courtyard.description: Central open courtyard providing natural light, air circulation, and a communal space for family gatherings. It is designed to serve as the heart of the farmhouse with vegetation and water features aligned according to Vastu.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony overlooking the central courtyard, designed for relaxation and morning sunlight.
Spacious balcony offering a view of the courtyard and ensuring ample ventilation.
